abstract: A video about how heavy video providers and downloaders may find Web providers placing limits or charging fees.
snippet: A video about how heavy video providers and downloaders may find Web providers placing limits or charging fees.
lead_paragraph: As Edward Wyatt wrote on Wednesday, a federal court ruled that the F.C.C. overstepped by telling Comcast it could not limit the amount of broadband available to certain heavy users.

headline.main: Court to FCC: Back Off on ‘Net Neutrality’
